judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed without prejudice to Jeremiah S. Yernon to pursue any other available legal remedy for the presentation of any claim he may have against the Estate of Edward B. Hudson, Jr., deceased, or Grace S. Hudson. Costs upon appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Sara Duffy, with her Edward S. Lawhorne, for appellant.
Myer L. Carson, with him C. Ayres Swayze, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Hudson Estate.
Argued January 4, 1967.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Sara Duffy, with her Edward S. Lawhorne, for appellant.
Myer L. Carson, with him C. Ayres Swayze, for appellee.
March 14, 1967:
